game.name: DuelVox: Max Quality
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: DuelVox: Max Quality is an offline first-person shooter made in western style. In this game there are many levels with different tasks, to complete them you will need ingenuity and dexterity, and sometimes even strategy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DuelVox: Max Quality is an offline first-person shooter made in western style. In this game there are many levels with different tasks, to complete them you will need ingenuity and dexterity, and sometimes even strategy.
